Jonathan Meinke graduated from the University of Bonn, Germany, and is currently a resident at the Department of Ophthalmology, University Eye Hospital Bonn. His research focuses on retinal changes and disease progression in retinal dystrophies such as Pseudoxanthoma Elasticum (PXE).
